name: Bright Sector
description:
It's a simple Third Person Shooter about a recon sent to clear the area,  before  technicians can step in. 

--------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look and Aim

LeftButtonMouse - Shoot

RightButtonMouse - Aiming

Num 1 - Select one weapon

Num 2 - Select two weapon

R - Reload

ESC - Pausa Game
